## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### Arduino Library Manager
1. Open Arduino IDE
2. Go to **Tools** â†’ **Manage Libraries**
3. Search for "Alteriom_EByte_LoRa_E220"
4. Click **Install**

### Manual Installation
1. Download the latest release from [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/Alteriom/EByte_LoRa_E220_Series_Library/releases/latest)
2. Extract to your Arduino libraries folder
3. Restart Arduino IDE

### PlatformIO
```ini
lib_deps = 
    Alteriom_EByte_LoRa_E220@^{VERSION}
```
